text: Six Flags Over Texas is a theme park in Arlington, Texas. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Six Flags Over Texas official website * Guide to Six Flags Over Texas - Unofficial Guide to the Park * Amusement Planet * Parktimes.com - Website focusing on the historical aspect of SFoT * Category:Six Flags amusement parks Category:Organizations based in Texas Category:Theme parks in the United States Category:Arlington, Texas Category:1961 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Texas
title: Six Flags Over Texas
